title: Transformational Leadership Competency Development for Digital Creativity Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and understanding of organizational workflows
context.additional_context: An online collaborative learning environment designed for science field practitioners to develop creative problem-solving skills using digital technology and lead organizational innovation through transformational leadership

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more strategies for concretizing creative ideas in digital environments.
Learners can apply the four core elements of transformational leadership (inspirational motivation, intellectual stimulation, etc.) to real-world work cases.
Learners can develop project plans using digital tools (3D modeling, data visualization, etc.) based on creative self-efficacy.
Learners can simulate the process of developing digital solutions by combining exploration and exploitation learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
